reviewText:
This could have been a excellent video - However, the photography was poorly  done and not sharp. The narration was horrible by virtue of the British accent and annunciation. Plus - The description given about the "Ferguson System" displayed a poor knowledge of the main functions of the total system - enough that Harry Ferguson must be turning in his grave.

Don't waste your money - buy a book instead!
This product is for my husband and is a surprise either for his birthday in November or for Christmas.  I'm sure he will like it.
